# CoronaVirus Data Analysis

## Data Extraction

The data comes from a R package called coronavirus created by Rami Krispin. The GitHub version of this package is refreshed on a daily basis. More information on this package can be found in this link <https://github.com/RamiKrispin/coronavirus>


## Analysis

The analysis consists of some dplyr data manupulation, creating a leaflet map and using gganimate. 

Package Leaflet provides some visually stunning interactive maps and you can choose between different providers. Here's a link to the types of map that leaflet provides <https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/>
